Articles.Content:
So I am trying to build an orbital craft with a lander, and I want to use the Merge function in the VAB so I can build them both separately, however whenever I select merge and the lander shows up there is no way to attach it to anything, there are no green attachment nodes, it is just transparent and useless. What am I doing wrong? Why won't it work?

Edited October 4, 2015 by guitarnerd666
Merge function is broken. Use the root gizmo to make your attachment point on the lander the root and the save it as a subassembly.
Nuts! Hope it gets fixed soon, thanks for the info!
